DataElement.preferredName: Complete Remission Date And Assessment Method Previous Report  Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the date and disease assessment method for the complete remission was previously reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Complete Remission Date And Assessment Method Previous Report
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The disappearance of all signs of cancer in response to treatment.  This does not always mean the cancer has been cured._The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._Occurring prior to something else._A short textual account; having provided a short account.
